title: New: Gremlins – Maim My Bitch
body:
**Gremlins**; an indie super group if I’ve ever heard one.

Composed of **Mat Cothran** (**Coma Cinema**, **Elvis Depressedly**), **Katie Lee** (**Braids**), **Patrick Jeffords** (**Toro y Moi**, **Kid Trails**) and **Sam Ray** (**Ricky Eat Acid**), their debut track is a lovably clumsy amalgamation of their sounds. With it’s squelchy synths and Cothran’s drawled vocals, alongside a few niche (pornographic?) samples thrown in for good measure, _Maim My Bitch_ is a divine listen, and a fantastic way for the four piece to announce themselves.

Via [Portals](http://www.portalsmusic.com/2012/02/sounds/gremlins-maim-my-bitch/).
